data.subTitle: 在watch监听开始之后立即被调用
data.content:
设置immediate属性为true

let vm=new Vue({
        el:"#first",
        data:{msg:'liuneng'},
        watch:{

            msg:{
                handler (newMsg,oldMsg){
                    console.log(newMsg);
                },
                immediate:true
            }
        }
    })
